description: The ALLN system aims to interconecting with the flight service of Far Eastern Air Transport Corporation (hereafter referred to as "FAT"), enhancing the possibility of further densifying and broadening its navigation network in various regions. Through associating the cryptocurrency with the solid consumption economy supported by large enterprises. ALLN takes the consumption style of credit card as a reference to establish a clearing center(Settlement center) for procedures in order to reduce the waiting time for exchanging commodities and forming business cooperation efficiently.
name: Airline and Life Networking
